welcome:
ğŸ‰ Welcome to ReferralBot! You can now join companies and start earning.

ğŸ  *Main Menu:*
start_instructions:
1. Buy from any company and get a referral code
2. Share your code (single-use, per company)
3. When someone uses your code and buys, you get 2% reward, they get 1% discount
4. Company must approve the purchase for rewards to be paid
5. All rewards, discounts, and balances are automatic and visible in your profile
6. Platform takes 5% fee, companies pay monthly
7. Use /help for full details

Let's get started! ğŸ‘‡
error_generic: âŒ Something went wrong. Please try again later or contact support.
main_menu:
ğŸ  *Main Menu*

What would you like to do? Choose an option below!
help:
ğŸ¤– *How ReferralBot Works:*

1ï¸âƒ£ Buy from any company to get a referral code (unique, single-use, per company)
2ï¸âƒ£ Share your code with friends
3ï¸âƒ£ When a friend uses your code and buys, you get 2% reward, they get 1% discount
4ï¸âƒ£ Company must approve the purchase for rewards to be paid
5ï¸âƒ£ All rewards, discounts, and balances are automatic and visible in your profile
6ï¸âƒ£ Platform takes 5% fee from each sale, companies pay 500-1000 birr/month
7ï¸âƒ£ Withdrawals take 3-5 days and may have a small fee
8ï¸âƒ£ No self-referral, codes expire after use

*For Companies:*
- Approve purchases to trigger rewards
- See all referrals, stats, and payouts in your dashboard
- All logic is automatic and transparent

For more info, contact @Nife777online

msg_referral_code_generated:
ğŸ¯ *Your Referral Code Generated!*

ğŸ“‹ *Code:* `{{code}}`
ğŸ¢ *Company:* {{companyName}}
ğŸ’° *Reward:* 2% of purchase
ğŸ“… *Expires:* Single use only

Share this code with friends! When they use it and make a purchase, you'll get 2% reward and they'll get 1% discount.

âš ï¸ *Important:*
â€¢ Code can only be used once
â€¢ Company must approve the purchase
â€¢ Rewards are paid automatically
â€¢ No self-referral allowed

By registering a company, you agree to:

â€¢ Provide accurate business information
â€¢ Approve purchases within 48 hours
â€¢ Pay platform fees monthly
â€¢ Maintain active business operations
â€¢ Follow all platform policies

Type 'I accept' to continue with registration.
